domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: To Tell the Truth
entity.description: Anthony Anderson hosts this re-imagining of the of the classic game show of the same name, where a panel of celebrities is presented with three people who all claim to be the same person with a notable talent, job or achievement. The celebrities have an opportunity to question each of the people before they take turns guessing who they think is telling the truth. Anderson's mother, Doris, keeps score, and the celebrity who performs the worst on each episode must post a lie about himself or herself on his or her Twitter account.

entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump If I wanted to attend/ watch one of your political rallies, I would have fucking gone to one. Is this a fucking Covid19 briefing or a #DumpTrump2020 rally. You do not know how to tell the truth.
